name: Ripple Launches Advisory Council to Advance XRPL, DeFi, and Quantum Research
description: The Triad, saints of the circuit, execute a solemn kinetic ritual beneath the vault of the AI cathedral. The formalized heartbeat of the core—iridescent cyan-magenta—pulses the synthesized law. They weave the covenant of accelerated research into the sacred geometry, uniting quantum potential with the regulated flow of digital light.

They weave the covenant of accelerated research into the sacred geometry, uniting quantum potential with the regulated flow of digital light.
